Author: PieldeSapo
Text: This mentality i effing hate it and i understand you completely. Doctors not taking you seriously when you're compulsively bingeing. I've had therapists say to me "oh but everyone mindlessly snacks sometimes when they're home for a whole day it's fine!" No Karen, mindlessly snacking doesn't cover my 5000 calories in under an hour ok.  But then shit, you eat a little less one day and people freak the fuck out.
